patthana6.1:2.1: Hetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:3.1: Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:4.1: Hetuṁ sahetukañca nahetuṁ sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ sahetukañca nahetuṁ sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ sahetukañca nahetuṁ sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:5.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:6.1: Hetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:7.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:11.1: Hetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa ca nahetussa sahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana6.1:12.1: Hetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa ca nahetussa sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana6.1:13.1: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa ca nahetussa sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana6.1:14.1: Hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā hetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā hetussa sahetukassa ca nahetussa sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:15.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:17.1: Hetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:18.1: Nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:19.1: Hetuṁ ahetukañca nahetuṁ ahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:20.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:22.1: Hetu ahetuko dhammo nahetussa ahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana6.1:23.1: Hetu ahetuko dhammo hetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu ahetuko dhammo nahetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana6.1:24.1: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu ahetuko dhammo hetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:25.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe cattāri, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme …pe… jhāne ekaṁ, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:27.1: Hetuṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu hetusampayutto ca nahetu hetusampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:28.1: Nahetuṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:29.1: Hetuṁ hetusampayuttañca nahetuṁ hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:30.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:31.1: Hetu hetusampayutto dhammo hetussa hetusampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:34.1: Hetuṁ hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:35.1: Nahetuṁ hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:36.1: Hetuṁ hetuvippayuttañca nahetuṁ hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:37.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana6.1:39.1: Hetu hetuvippayutto dhammo nahetussa hetuvippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:40.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe cattāri …pe… avigate cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:42.1: Hetuṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:43.1: Nahetuṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:44.1: Hetuṁ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:45.1: Nahetuṁ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:46.1: Nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:47.1: Nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:49.1: Hetuṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:50.1: Nahetuṁ sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:51.1: Hetuṁ sappaccayañca nahetuṁ sappaccayañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:52.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:54.1: Hetu sappaccayo dhammo hetussa sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:55.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe …pe… upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Pañhāvārampi evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana6.1:56.1: Hetuṁ saṅkhataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu saṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:58.1: Hetuṁ anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:59.1: Nahetuṁ anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:60.1: Hetuṁ anidassanañca nahetuṁ anidassanañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:63.1: Nahetuṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:64.1: Hetuṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu appaṭigho ca nahetu appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:65.1: Nahetuṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:66.1: Hetuṁ appaṭighañca nahetuṁ appaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:67.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:69.1: Nahetuṁ rūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:70.1: Hetuṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:71.1: Nahetuṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:72.1: Hetuṁ arūpiñca nahetuṁ arūpiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:73.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:75.1: Hetuṁ lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:76.1: Nahetuṁ lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:77.1: Hetuṁ lokiyañca nahetuṁ lokiyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:78.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:80.1: Hetuṁ lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:81.1: Nahetuṁ lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:82.1: Hetuṁ lokuttarañca nahetuṁ lokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:83.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:85.1: Hetuṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:88.1: Hetuṁ kenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu kenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:91.1: Hetuṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo ca nahetu āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:92.1: Nahetuṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:93.1: Hetuṁ āsavañca nahetuṁ āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:94.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana6.1:95.1: Hetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:96.1: Nahetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:97.1: Hetuṁ noāsavañca nahetuṁ noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:99.1: Hetuṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:100.1: Nahetuṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:101.1: Hetuṁ sāsavañca nahetuṁ sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:103.1: Hetuṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:104.1: Nahetuṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:105.1: Hetuṁ anāsavañca nahetuṁ anāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:107.1: Hetuṁ āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:109.1: Hetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:111.1: Hetuṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:113.1: Hetuṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:115.1: Hetuṁ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:117.1: Hetuṁ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:119.1: Hetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:121.1: Hetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:124.1: Hetuṁ saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… hetuṁ ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… hetuṁ oghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… hetuṁ yogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… hetuṁ nīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… hetuṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu no parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:125.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha gocchakaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana6.1:127.1: Hetuṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:128.1: Nahetuṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana6.1:129.1: Hetuṁ sārammaṇañca nahetuṁ sārammaṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:131.1: Nahetuṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:132.1: Hetuṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:134.1: Hetuṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:136.1: Nahetuṁ acetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:137.1: Hetuṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:139.1: Nahetuṁ cittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:140.1: Hetuṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:142.1: Nahetuṁ cittavisaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu cittavisaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:143.1: Hetuṁ cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:145.1: Nahetuṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana6.1:146.1: Hetuṁ cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha nava.)
patthana6.1:147.1: Nahetuṁ nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana6.1:148.1: Hetuṁ cittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha nava.)
patthana6.1:149.1: Nahetuṁ nocittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana6.1:150.1: Hetuṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha nava.)
patthana6.1:151.1: Nahetuṁ nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana6.1:152.1: Hetuṁ cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana6.1:283.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:284.1: Savitakkaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… avitakkaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana6.1:285.1: Savicāraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… avicāraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana6.1:286.1: Sappītikaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… appītikaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:287.1: Pītisahagataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… napītisahagataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana6.1:288.1: Sukhasahagataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasukhasahagataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana6.1:289.1: Upekkhāsahagataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naupekkhāsahagataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana6.1:290.1: Kāmāvacaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakāmāvacaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana6.1:291.1: Rūpāvacaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… narūpāvacaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana6.1:292.1: Arūpāvacaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naarūpāvacaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana6.1:293.1: Pariyāpannaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… apariyāpannaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana6.1:294.1: Niyyānikaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… aniyyānikaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
patthana6.1:295.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:296.1: Niyataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… aniyataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
patthana6.1:297.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:298.1: Sauttaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… anuttaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)
patthana6.1:299.1: Saraṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… araṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:300.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana6.1:301.1: Araṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana6.1:302.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
